item.title: The what, when and why of wireframes
item.description: James Kelway's article on wireframes in the User Pathways blog summarizes what the different types are, what their purpose is, who the audience for their use are, and how they are typically implemented. There are several nice illustrations in this article for those that need to explain what they are. http://userpathways.com/2008/06/26/the-what-when-and-why-of-wireframes/
